content: You will next receive a multiple-choice question, each with five options: A, B, C, D, and E respectively. Please provide your answer as a single letter option (your response should contain only one letter as the answer).(For each problem, you need to first present three related but not identical problems, along with a description of each problem and its solution. Finally, provide the answer to the original problem in the form of "Therefore, the final answer is: ".)

Question: The painter started to edge the room with tape, he always took extra care to make the lines clean and crisp when working with an what?
Options: A. triangle B. middle C. corner D. center E. interior

A. The painter started to edge the room with tape, he always took extra care to make the lines clean and crisp when working with a triangle. The painter was working on a mural and wanted to make sure the lines were straight and even.
B. The painter started to edge the room with tape, he always took extra care to make the lines clean and crisp when working with the middle. The painter was working on a mural and wanted to make sure the lines were straight and even.
C. The painter started to edge the room with tape, he always took extra care to make the lines clean and crisp when working with a corner. The painter was working on a mural and wanted to make sure the lines were straight and even.
D. The painter started to edge the room with tape, he always took extra care to make the lines clean and crisp when working with the center. The painter was working on a mural and wanted to make sure the lines were straight and even.

Therefore, the final answer is: C.
